subject: Off-Track Betting
Shutdowns (Institutional)
lead_paragraph: The closure of New York City Off-Track Betting parlors is an inconvenience, not a career killer, for Jesus Leonardo, who made a steady income cashing discarded betting slips.
snippet: The closure of New York City Off-Track Betting parlors is an inconvenience, not a career killer, for Jesus Leonardo, who made a steady income cashing discarded betting slips.
